title: ChickenAlfredo
body:
<<set $foodChosen to "chicken alfredo">>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cheff>>
<<portrait|teruteru>>
<<if $foodChosen is "chicken alfredo">>
    All right, one chicken alfredo, coming right up.
<<endif>>
<<if $foodChosen is "miso soup">>
    All right, one miso soup, coming right up.
<<endif>>
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cheff>>
<<portrait|teruteru>>
... Here you go. One chicken alfredo.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|First Mate>>
<<portrait|hajime>>
Thanks!
<</Textbox>>

[[Time to eat!|Eat]]

title: crewmateChatStart
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<name|First Mate>>
<<portrait|hajime>>
Hey.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cheff>>
<<portrait|teruteru>>
What's up?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|First Mate>>
<<portrait|hajime>>
I'm hongry.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cheff>>
<<portrait|teruteru>>
All right. What do you want?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|First Mate>>
<<portrait|hajime>>
(Hmm... What DO I want?)
<</Textbox>>

[[Chicken alfredo, please!|ChickenAlfredo]] 
[[Miso soup sounds good!|MisoSoup]]

title: MisoSoup
body:
<<set $foodChosen to "miso soup">>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cheff>>
<<portrait|teruteru>>
<<if $foodChosen is "chicken alfredo">>
    All right, one chicken alfredo, coming right up.
<<endif>>
<<if $foodChosen is "miso soup">>
    All right, one miso soup, coming right up.
<<endif>>
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cheff>>
<<portrait|teruteru>>
... Here you go. One miso soup.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|First Mate>>
<<portrait|hajime>>
Thanks!
<</Textbox>>

[[Time to eat!|Eat]]

title: Eat
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<name|First Mate>>
<<portrait|hajime>>
<<if $foodChosen is "chicken alfredo">>
    That was some good chicken alfredo! <<print $foodChosen>>
<<endif>>
<<if $foodChosen is "miso soup">>
    That was some good miso soup! <<print $foodChosen>>
<<endif>>
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cheff>>
<<portrait|teruteru>>
Glad you like it.
<</Textbox>>
